biotools.summary: BioPortal is a web accessible open repository of biomedical ontologies. Users may browse, search and visualize ontologies, as well as participate in the evaluation and evolution of ontology reviews by adding notes, corrections, reviews, etc. Data from other sources such as GEO, ClinicalTrials.gov and ArrayExpress may also be integrated with the ontologies.
